item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, December 15, 2024 at 5:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. School smartphone ban results in better sleep and improved mood: study (317 points | 164 comments)
2. Tenstorrent and the State of AI Hardware Startups (43 points | 6 comments)
3. IRATA.ONLINE: A Community for Retro-Computing Enthusiasts (142 points | 34 comments)
4. Man ran 700 miles to make 'insanely impressive' art on GPS fitness app (77 points | 24 comments)
5. Computing Inside an AI (11 points | 1 comment)
6. NYC wants you to stop taking traffic cam selfies, but here's how to do it anyway (250 points | 72 comments)
7. Machine Learning at Ente – On-Device, E2EE (7 points | discuss)
8. The Clever Hans Effect, Iterative LLM Prompting, and Socrates' Meno (13 points | 3 comments)
9. Llama.cpp Now Supports Qwen2-VL (Vision Language Model) (48 points | 9 comments)
10. 4100 / 4200 Series Graphic Terminals (a.k.a. Unicorn) (10 points | discuss)
11. Pi modder successfully adds M.2 slot to Pi 500 (48 points | 16 comments)
12. Show HN: A simple web game to help learn chords and basic progressions (78 points | 19 comments)
13. Doom ported to run mostly only on AMD GPUs via ROCm and LLVM Libc (8 points | 1 comment)

19. How big data created the modern dairy cow (34 points | 28 comments)
20. Byte Latent Transformer: Patches Scale Better Than Tokens (302 points | 76 comments)
21. Should programming languages be safe or powerful? (52 points | 57 comments)
22. What is entropy? A measure of just how little we know (255 points | 105 comments)
23. Four Hidden Species of Portuguese Man-O'-War (51 points | 14 comments)
24. Show HN: Svader – Create GPU-rendered Svelte components (167 points | 37 comments)
25. I made a free Figma library packed with components for fast prototyping (209 points | 56 comments)
26. Wasp (YC W21) is hiring a framework engineer to build Rails for JavaScript ( | hide)
27. They see your photos (218 points | 126 comments)
28. Ilya Sutskever NeurIPS talk [video] (278 points | 179 comments)
29. Conversations are better with four people (151 points | 103 comments)
30. Study reveals mammoth as key food source for ancient Americans (86 points | 60 comments)
